mapper.update: update delivery_charge set basic_delivery_cost = #{basicDeliveryCost}, free_delivery_condition = #{freeDeliveryCondition}, jeju_delivery_cost = #{jejuDeliveryCost}, island_mountain_delivery_cost = #{islandMountainDeliveryCost} where charge_id = 1
mapper.select: SELECT di.delivery_id, cm.carrier_code, di.invoice_number FROM delivery_info di inner join carrier_mapping cm on di.carrier_id = cm.carrier_id WHERE di.tracking_delivery = '배송중'
mapper.update: update delivery_info set tracking_delivery = '배송완료', delivery_complete_date = current_timestamp where delivery_id = #{deliveryId}
mapper.select: select rd.return_delivery_id, cm.carrier_code, rd.invoice_number from return_delivery rd inner join carrier_mapping cm on rd.carrier_id = cm.carrier_id inner join returns r on rd.return_id = r.return_id where r.return_status = '상품수거완료'

select epd.pickup_delivery_id, cm.carrier_code, epd.pickup_invoice from exchange_pickup_delivery epd inner join carrier_mapping cm on epd.carrier_id = cm.carrier_id inner join exchange e on epd.exchange_id = e.exchange_id where e.exchange_status = '상품수거중'
mapper.update: update exchange e inner join exchange_pickup_delivery epd on epd.exchange_id = e.exchange_id set e.exchange_status = '상품수거완료', epd.pickup_complete_date = now() WHERE e.exchange_id= #{exchangeId}
